pages.title: Astral Orrery
pages.text: Centrally located in the Celestial Observation Chamber, the Astral Orrery is an elaborate mechanical model of the cosmos. Its radiant central sphere and orbiting celestial bodies, crafted from precious metals and enchanted materials, simulate the movements of the stars.

pages.title: Capabilities
pages.text: The Orrery predicts astronomical events, provides astrological insights, and serves as an educational tool for studying cosmic mechanics—all while being powered by the Bastion’s Aetherflow Conduit.
